lyrics:
20 contributorsstorm in a teacup lyricsintro snagglepuss
“oh good god in heaven almighty heavens to murgatroyd

somebody get down here now”

verse 1 anthony kiedis
come on come on baby
let me show you what im talking about

looka— looka likea likea— like you wanna get some

if you never tell a lie then you never have to play dumb

dirty baby time youre gonna take some

little lady what a reputation
kinda shady now youre gonna make again
see red hot chili peppers liveget tickets as low as 75you might also likechorus anthony kiedis

a tiny storm in your teacup girl
i know you can battle the masses dear
a tiny storm in your teacup girl

interlude snagglepuss

its getting worse worse by the minute
were down here at division and 5th street
someone send for back up right now”
